description:
Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merry`s seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaizoku Yuukai Jiken to Shi o Matsu Dake no Kaizokusen
Pirate Abduction Incident! A Pirate Ship That Can Only Await Her End!
Un pirate kidnappé et un navire à l’agonie
حادثة اختطاف قرصان وسفينة لا يسعها سوى انتظار نهايتها
คลีลักพาตัวโจรสลัด และเรือโจรสลัดที่ได้แต่รอความตาย
海賊誘拐事件と死を待つだけの海賊船
